title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4250.6 - Niagara, St. Lawrence, Erie, and Jefferson Counties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4250.6 - Niagara, St. Lawrence, Erie, and Jefferson Counties

State Regulations

Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this rule, the
corporation shall provide at least $500,000 in program funds to community based
lending organizations for the purpose of making loans to small businesses
located in each of the following counties: Niagara, St. Lawrence, Erie and

Jefferson. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4250.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
